GradCafe Analytics Documentation
=================================

Welcome to the official documentation for the
GradCafe Analytics Application (Module 4 Project).

This documentation includes:

- Project Overview & Setup Instructions
- System Architecture
- API Reference (autogenerated from docstrings)
- Testing Guide
